name: Rebel Scout (V)
Lore: 'A Rebel Scout such as Vidar Blin is usually assigned to recon missions. Trained in first-response tactics, many come to the Alliance with prior special forces experience.',
Text: 'May deploy -1 as a ''react'' to same site as a Rebel. When deployed, may peek at the top card of a Reserve Deck; may place that card on bottom of that Reserve Deck.',
